{% endraw %} {% raw %}

ccs_to_mobility_for_df[source]

ccs_to_mobility_for_df(precursor_df:DataFrame, ccs_column:str, vendor='bruker')

Args: precursor_df (pd.DataFrame): precursor_df ccs_column (str): CCS column name in precursor_df vendor (str, optional): Different vender may have different IM calculation. Defaults to "bruker". Note that other vendors are not implemented currently.

Returns: np.array: mobility values

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

mobility_to_ccs_for_df[source]

mobility_to_ccs_for_df(precursor_df:DataFrame, mobility_column:str, vendor='bruker')

Args: precursor_df (pd.DataFrame): precursor_df mobility_column (str): mobility column name in precursor_df vendor (str, optional): Different vender may have different IM calculation. Defaults to "bruker". Note that other vendors are not implemented currently.

Returns: np.array: CCS values
